triples.name: Isabelle (proof assistant)
triples.relevance: Isabelle/HOL is the core proof assistant platform that the paper extends to support proof reconstruction from SMT solvers.

triples.name: Automated theorem proving
triples.relevance: Automated theorem provers are the external tools that Sledgehammer integrates with to prove Isabelle goals.

triples.name: Satisfiability modulo theories
triples.relevance: SMT solvers are the core external reasoning tools that the paper extends and integrates with Isabelle.

triples.name: Cooperating Validity Checker
triples.relevance: The paper extends cvc5 (the latest CVC solver) to produce proofs in the Alethe format, enabling it to work with Isabelle.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Formal verification is the broader application domain where the improved proof reconstruction techniques enable more automated verification.
